Audio Description:
A soldier in combat uniform looks out at the viewer, giving a “thumbs up” sign. His uniform is brown and open at the neck and he has a black wristwatch on his left art. He has a rifle slung over his right shoulder. His dark brown helmet has netting with green leaves woven into it. Behind him, under a yellow sky are a grouping of palm trees and a small patch of blue water. At the top of the poster, in a black rectangle are the words “We’ll take care of the rising sun” in large white letters. Below the soldier is a black rectangle with the words “You take care of rising prices” in white letters. At the bottom of the poster is a list of ways to curb inflation, written in black letters on a white background: 1. Buy and hold war bonds; 2. Pay willingly our share of taxes; 3. Provide adequate life insurance and savings for our future; 4. Reduce our debts as much as possible; 5. Buy only what we need and make what we have last longer; 6. Follow ration rules and price ceilings; 7. Cooperate with our government’s wage stabilization program.
To the left of each item on this list is the outline of a key with a red letter in it. As you read the letters from top to bottom they spell “Victory”.
